title: UnVamped
description: Enid lived a normal misanthropic teenage existence until one day a Vampire took an interest in her. Curious as popular culture envisions some grand romance, Enid decided to take a chance. Except her vampire wasn't quite what the mythologies led her to believe. After a short courtship, she realizes that this encounter isn't all it was cracked up to be.
author: Jayme Roxann Wright
